Name: Desert of Vice
About the game: Desert of Vice - a horror text adventure game. Solve the mystery of an isolated town in the middle of a desert in this new Lovecraftian adventure game! Type the desired command and see the action come to life! Key features: • A story rich adventure. • Choice dependent multiple endings. • Unique text based controls. • Tailor made soundtrack by @cesque. Inspired by the works of Franz Kafka and H.P. Lovecraft.
